resources.string:
BiblioHouse is a platform for readers where they can buy books and get it delivered at their doorsteps. 
 It provides a user friendly interface for users to interact and provides product support. 
 The app was developed as a part of the Software Engineering Project by the students of Seacom Engineering College. 
 The developers are: 
 Rajarshi Das 
 Subhasis Mukhopadhyay 
 Bitan Das 
 Soumojit Sadhukhan
